base.title: Base
base.description: The base directory for the project data.

trials.title: Trials
trials.description: The directory in which the individual trials are. Must be relative to the base directory.

results.title: Results
results.description: The directory in which the results will go. Must be relative to the base directory. Will be created if it is missing.

results_file.title: Results File
results_file.description: The name of the results file. Will go in the results directory. Default: results.csv

directory_per_trial.title: Directory Per Trial
directory_per_trial.description: The directory in which the data are for a given trial. Must be relative to a trial folder, and all trials must share this pattern.

Fit.title: Fit
Fit.description: Configure the linear regression of thermocouple temperatures vs. position.

do_plot.title: Do Plot
do_plot.description: Whether to plot the linear regression.
